teams.name: Making Sense
teams.loan_because: it makes sense! And this is what investing should be all about.
teams.description: We try to make investing as simple and useful as possible: transfer idle money to those who can use it productively - whether that be a listed company, a start up or a micro credit borrower. For the guide lines see below

teams.name: Jessop Elmose
teams.loan_because: we're hoping to make a small bit of change in this big world!
teams.description: We're a family who wants to encourage each other to take part in Kiva's micro lending!

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.loan_because: We are members of the Conservative Party in the UK who believe that helping citizens of poorer countries to create wealth is the best way to take people out of poverty.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Ohio University Bobcats
teams.loan_because: Every student and alumni of Ohio University I've ever met has some sense of public duty and community service.  Here we can easily make a positive difference worldwide.
teams.description: Alumni and students of one of the best universities you could ever attend.  Go Bobcats!!

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

--------------------------------

A beautiful picture of our wonderful reality… Beautiful, varied, colorful, lively.... unique……. Italian!

teams.name: Late Loaning Lenders
teams.loan_because:
We hate to see loans being left unfunded on 
Kiva. Although most of these loans are 
pre-funded by the Field Partners, the Field
Partners lose out on the capital if a loan
doesn't get funded on Kiva. We believe that 
this will damage the Field Partners in the long 
term and impair their capacity to make loans to new borrowers.

We can't save every red loan, but we try to
make a difference as in the Starfish Story:
http://67.199.70.191/articles/the-starfish-story.aspx
Help us fund loans we're already supporting:
http://www.kiva.org/team/late_loaning_lenders/loans?status=fundRaising


Check out Charlotte's Web: http://starfish.dynalias.org

This watchlist for loans suggested by the team members (starfish + offlist) shows:
* the current position in the popularity ranking (considering pages 1 to 5)
* the timestamp of the most recent loan
* the basket amount
Click magnifier icon for more info.  Or read Charlotte’s post at @Charlotte re: #346848
Also known as "CW," or "Charlotte's Web of Wonders"


We invite you to join us and make a difference, too. Please check the team board at 2 am Kiva time, 7 am Kiva time, 1 pm Kiva time and 6 pm Kiva time to coordinate lending.

See our team fund page:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/kivalllfund
teams.description:
Alan's account of the founding of LLL is on the  team board @Alan re: #260143. Loans that are nearing expiry won't get funded if they don't get noticed. We look for loans that are about to expire by using the Sort By:
"Expiring Soon" option instead of the default "Popularity", and then work to get them funded.

See our team FAQ, linked above (the "Team Website" button, next to our traffic light avatar).

A Team LLL glossary (contributed by team member Tony):

Red Loans: Loans that have less than five days to be funded, identifiable by the red box 
with the notice that says "Only x days left!" or 
"Only x hours and y minutes left!"

LLL - Late Loaning Lenders: this team, where 
lenders work together to keep loans from 
expiring.

SFDD - Starfish Daily Dozen: Under current 
practice, one of these lists is prepared and 
posted for each day, to help LLL lenders focus 
and coordinate their lending on a targeted 
group of loans (the Starfish or SF). The lists 
are prepared by a group of volunteers who 
seek to be objective in selecting the loans to 
be included in their lists. They also seek to 
spread out the loans in each list over a 24 hour 
period and to share the joy among the Field 
Partners with loans expiring during that period, 
but their efforts are always constrained by the 
choice of loans that are available for inclusion 
in the list. Loans with larger amounts needed 
will be included in the period immediately after 
each Credit Day, when lenders are feeling 
flush, but the lists will become less ambitious 
when the LLL lenders are feeling poor.

GG - Gorgeous Group: The SFDD list-makers have the option of adding one or two of these 
loans after their SFDD lists. As the name 
implies, only group loans are picked. When it is 
first posted, a typical GG loan will expire two 
days or more after the list is posted. It will 
usually be retained as a GG until it becomes 
Fully Funded or moves into Starfish range. The amount needed when the loan is selected as a GG will vary depending on the time of month.

RTR - Reduce the Red: These lists are 
prepared and posted when there are large 
numbers of loans slated to expire in a short 
period of time. "Red" is a reference to the red 
boxes that are added to a loan description 
when the Loan is about to expire without full 
funding.

BTB - Battling the Boxes: On those days where 
there aren't 12 loans that qualify as "Starfish," 
the listmakers will include BTB loans to help 
focus attention on the red-boxed loans with the best chances. The criteria are similar to SF 
loans, i.e., one per field partner and reasonable 
amounts left to fund (not too much; not too 
little), except that these loans may have a longer time left before their expiry date. If they gain good traction on their first BTB day, they may be carried forward. If not ... they stand a second chance as SF.

Bulge: A short period in which a great many 
loans have their scheduled funding expiration 
times. Bulges come about primarily when a 
Field Partner (FP) submits an amount of loans 
to Kiva than is greater than the FP's quota. The loan 
descriptions are prepared for posting by 
translating the loan descriptions (if necessary) 
and editing them, and they are then held in a queue by Kiva's server, to be posted when the FP has freed up some of its credit limit on Kiva, by making some repayments. Bulge loans are prize candidates for inclusion 
in Reduce the Red lists.

FF - Fully Funded: This is LLL code for a loan 
that has received all the loans required for it to be removed from the list of loans that are raising funds 
and to move into paying back status.

Lars Ratio: the average funding per hour that is needed for a loan to become fully funded.
(Developed by team member Lars)

Wiedergänger (contributed by Maria) - German expression, literal translation "again walker," meaning "undead," i.e. a person that has died but comes back, aka a zombie. Here it means a loan that disappears from the page, but comes back again because somebody didn't check out their basket.

Ruma sana (contributed by Jouko and Potkukelkka) - Finnish expression, literal translation "ugly words."  It is a phrase to use when you are very frustrated, but want to stop just short of actual cursing -- for example, when the Kiva site repeatedly logs you out when you are trying to rescue an expiring loan at the last second.

See data about all loans currently fundraising on Kiva:
www.kivatools.com
See data about loans that have been mentioned on the LLL board, including the most recent lending activity on each loan:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/
See loans in real time, as they are made:
http://www.http://kivalive.com/index2.php

Lists are posted on the LLL Team message 
board. Join us!

teams.name: Education Generation
teams.loan_because: We believe in empowering others to achieve their dreams.
teams.description: The Education Generation team is made up of Kiva lenders that also believe in the power of education to change lives. Supporters also support student scholarships with donations as small as $20 to specific students around the world with Education Generation.

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Three Cups of Tea - CAI Supporters
teams.loan_because: we have been touched, moved, inspired, and motivated by the example of Greg Mortenson, humanitarian, peace-maker, and author of "Three Cups of Tea: One Man's Mission To Promote Peace... One School At A Time."  Please read it if you have not already done so: your life will be changed.  We also support the Central Asia Institute (CAI), and Pennies For Peace (www.penniesforpeace.org)
teams.description: We lend especially to women in Pakistan and Afghanistan, where Mortenson and CAI are active in establishing community schools in rural areas.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.loan_because:
25 Changes Lives!

25 cents collected from each student added together makes changes they can learn from!
teams.description: Our goal is for each student in the world to donate to Kiva at school. Then the money is loaned out and the classes and school learn about the lives of people in other countries, learn about finance and business. Maybe even make friends!

teams.name: 1OR8FACTION
teams.loan_because: We struggle just as much as the next person to reach our dreams, through all adversity and tribulations. And we're a team of young, multi-cultural artists & entrepreneurs. We want to lend to fellow dreamers!
teams.description: We're like a United Nations in a music record label. There's Japanese, Korean, Philippine, Sri Lankan, Bulgarian, Singaporean in our team. We all eat totally different food, but share the totally same vision of music & success.

teams.name: Lesley University Supports KIVA!
teams.loan_because: We believe in KIVA's innovative mission. We offer our support in hopes that the future brings a positive global community in which all businesses are as socially-minded as KIVA.
teams.description: Impassioned and determined students taking steps towards lasting social change.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: The Photobooth People Mammoth Sports & friends!
teams.loan_because: we're in a position where our loose change can create a stepping stone out of poverty to disadvantaged entrepreneurs.
teams.description:
The Photobooth People operate the largest photobooth group in Australia. 
All of our Network Members are benefiting as they enter this industry surrounded by like-minded business owners all working together to help each other’s businesses grow – and the results have been outstanding.

We invite you to join us and make a difference, too. Please check the team board at 2 am Kiva time, 7 am Kiva time, 1 pm Kiva time and 6 pm Kiva time to coordinate lending.

See our team fund page:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/kivalllfund
teams.description:
Alan's account of the founding of LLL is on the  team board @Alan re: #260143. Loans that are nearing expiry won't get funded if they don't get noticed. We look for loans that are about to expire by using the Sort By:
"Expiring Soon" option instead of the default "Popularity", and then work to get them funded.

See our team FAQ, linked above (the "Team Website" button, next to our traffic light avatar).

A Team LLL glossary (contributed by team member Tony):

Red Loans: Loans that have less than five days to be funded, identifiable by the red box 
with the notice that says "Only x days left!" or 
"Only x hours and y minutes left!"

LLL - Late Loaning Lenders: this team, where 
lenders work together to keep loans from 
expiring.

SFDD - Starfish Daily Dozen: Under current 
practice, one of these lists is prepared and 
posted for each day, to help LLL lenders focus 
and coordinate their lending on a targeted 
group of loans (the Starfish or SF). The lists 
are prepared by a group of volunteers who 
seek to be objective in selecting the loans to 
be included in their lists. They also seek to 
spread out the loans in each list over a 24 hour 
period and to share the joy among the Field 
Partners with loans expiring during that period, 
but their efforts are always constrained by the 
choice of loans that are available for inclusion 
in the list. Loans with larger amounts needed 
will be included in the period immediately after 
each Credit Day, when lenders are feeling 
flush, but the lists will become less ambitious 
when the LLL lenders are feeling poor.

GG - Gorgeous Group: The SFDD list-makers have the option of adding one or two of these 
loans after their SFDD lists. As the name 
implies, only group loans are picked. When it is 
first posted, a typical GG loan will expire two 
days or more after the list is posted. It will 
usually be retained as a GG until it becomes 
Fully Funded or moves into Starfish range. The amount needed when the loan is selected as a GG will vary depending on the time of month.

RTR - Reduce the Red: These lists are 
prepared and posted when there are large 
numbers of loans slated to expire in a short 
period of time. "Red" is a reference to the red 
boxes that are added to a loan description 
when the Loan is about to expire without full 
funding.

BTB - Battling the Boxes: On those days where 
there aren't 12 loans that qualify as "Starfish," 
the listmakers will include BTB loans to help 
focus attention on the red-boxed loans with the best chances. The criteria are similar to SF 
loans, i.e., one per field partner and reasonable 
amounts left to fund (not too much; not too 
little), except that these loans may have a longer time left before their expiry date. If they gain good traction on their first BTB day, they may be carried forward. If not ... they stand a second chance as SF.

Bulge: A short period in which a great many 
loans have their scheduled funding expiration 
times. Bulges come about primarily when a 
Field Partner (FP) submits an amount of loans 
to Kiva than is greater than the FP's quota. The loan 
descriptions are prepared for posting by 
translating the loan descriptions (if necessary) 
and editing them, and they are then held in a queue by Kiva's server, to be posted when the FP has freed up some of its credit limit on Kiva, by making some repayments. Bulge loans are prize candidates for inclusion 
in Reduce the Red lists.

FF - Fully Funded: This is LLL code for a loan 
that has received all the loans required for it to be removed from the list of loans that are raising funds 
and to move into paying back status.

Lars Ratio: the average funding per hour that is needed for a loan to become fully funded.
(Developed by team member Lars)

Wiedergänger (contributed by Maria) - German expression, literal translation "again walker," meaning "undead," i.e. a person that has died but comes back, aka a zombie. Here it means a loan that disappears from the page, but comes back again because somebody didn't check out their basket.

Ruma sana (contributed by Jouko and Potkukelkka) - Finnish expression, literal translation "ugly words."  It is a phrase to use when you are very frustrated, but want to stop just short of actual cursing -- for example, when the Kiva site repeatedly logs you out when you are trying to rescue an expiring loan at the last second.

See data about all loans currently fundraising on Kiva:
www.kivatools.com
See data about loans that have been mentioned on the LLL board, including the most recent lending activity on each loan:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/
See loans in real time, as they are made:
http://www.http://kivalive.com/index2.php

Lists are posted on the LLL Team message 
board. Join us!

teams.name: Education Generation
teams.loan_because: We believe in empowering others to achieve their dreams.
teams.description: The Education Generation team is made up of Kiva lenders that also believe in the power of education to change lives. Supporters also support student scholarships with donations as small as $20 to specific students around the world with Education Generation.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.loan_because: Miss This Girls loan Because have passed been inspired by other kiva member , we relly believ in our organization , and would like for you to do the same , we understand one hand really helps the other..
teams.description:
M. T. G 
M.T.G Has officially started.. Join Miss This Girls, a Non Profiit Organization for teenage girls trying to get off the streets,  but into Music Recording, Professional Photography, and just being a Girl on Her Road to Success...
 Miss This Studio will provide Studio Equipment and Professional Photography Cameras for these Young Ladies to utilize to make their " DREAMS COME TRUE".
 Our Teens are kindly asking for Donation and Sponsors for Various Challenges that we Girls May Face On Our Way To Succeed, your donations Will  Provide , Live inside Teachers to teach,  hands on skills for these young ladies to succeed. 
With your donation our teens will be able to Perform , go on Trip and Produce their own Music CD.  Miss This Studios Is A Great Opportunity for our young Girls in  Our Community ... To sponsor these Young Ladies Please Contact Miss This Studios @ 347 -471- 4514 or Email : msseemenomore@aol.com.. Starting age to join is 13 to 25  Moms and Dads are More than Welcome to donate or sponsor. Thank You .  
TO BECOME A MEMBER OR A PROUD SPONSORER CONTACT:
msseemenomore@aol.com  347- 471-4514 
note all new members will be announce in M.T.G Local News letter w/ Option Of Promotion On website!
All Sponsors will be appreciated and specially thank by the teens in M.T.G in M.T.G News Letter + Website.
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=VA4W5Y8TGSM58

teams.whereabouts: Silver Creek High School San Jose,

teams.name: The University of Hong Kong
teams.description: We are alumni, staff, current student and friends of the University of Hong Kong with a vision to produce well-rounded graduates with lifelong abilities to provide leadership within the societies they serve.

teams.name: Team Tonight
teams.loan_because: We are blessed with good fortune and want to make a difference in the lives of others.
teams.description: We work together on the American TV program "The Tonight Show With Conan O'Brien"

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia. 
( Photo Copyright 2007 D L Ennis all rights reserved http://dlennis.wordpress.com )

teams.name: Sobhet House
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: My family

teams.name: TRAVEL BUG
teams.loan_because: We travel the world and see many cultures and people, some not as fortunate as us. Hopefully the small input we make can change somebody's life.

teams.name: Skin Sense, a day spa
teams.loan_because: Skin Sense, a day spa takes pride in our community involvement. The Skin Sense Foundation focuses its charitable giving on causes that benefit women, children, and animals.
teams.description: Skin Sense, a day spa combines state-of-the-art techniques with a holistic philosophy to promote total body wellness. Our staff and clients would like to provide opportunities to people around the world.

teams.name: BombinaMD
teams.loan_because: To support children in need, and children's services
teams.description: A caring pediatric practice

teams.name: Shooting Stars
teams.loan_because: Every journey begins with the first step. We are taking small steps to help others take their first step...
teams.description: A caring, willing group that wants to see change in the world.  We wish to do our small part.

teams.name: Torpedo Press
teams.loan_because: We want to help fellow entrepreneurs achieve financial freedom.
teams.description: A collection of passionate entrepreneurs who want to help others make a difference in their lives.

teams.name: Simply Susan
teams.loan_because: Every little bit of help makes things better.
teams.description: Susan, mother of three and grandmother to seven, knows there is much which goes beyond hers or anyone's family.  Helping others who pass through our lives is the key to a better world.

teams.name: Campinácios
teams.loan_because: We want to change the world!
teams.description: A group of young people that do summer camps!

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: The Microlending Fund
teams.loan_because: We believe, through education and knowledge, we can make Kiva a common mode of charity for businesses.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Dover Mass
teams.loan_because: We believe that everyone should be given the opportunity to  become self sufficient, have access to health care, education, and raise their family safely and in peace.
teams.description: Our team has demonstrated through diverse charitable activities that it was genuinely interested in helping those in needs, and in creating a better world, one person at a time.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Happy Guys
teams.loan_because:
We want to give people something to smile about.
Share a smile with all humanity.
teams.description:
We are like smiles.

A smile costs nothing but gives much.  It enriches those who receive without making poorer those who give.  It takes but a moment, but the memory of it sometimes lasts forever.  None is so rich or mighty that he cannot get along without it and none is so poor that he cannot be made rich by it.  Yet a smile cannot be bought, begged, borrowed, or stolen, for it is something that is of no value to anyone until it is given away.  Some people are too tired to give you a smile.  Give them one of yours, as none needs a smile so much as he who has no more to give.

teams.name: Red Hat
teams.loan_because: It is part of the philosophy of our company. We want to bring open and free software to the world. Part of that culture is helping others help themselves.
teams.description: The Red Hat team consists of employees only, we work for a company that helps people use free and open source software as effectively as possible. Free and open source software is software that you can get from the internet for no cost, and you have the freedom to look at the source and do with it what you want. This helps people educate themselves, but also creates better software as many people can look at it and find bugs.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: One Grain of Rice
teams.loan_because: We love to share!
teams.description: There is an old tale about a clever girl named Rani who saved her people from starvation by requesting, as her reward for a good deed, just one grain of rice doubled every day for thirty days. The raja thinks this is a foolish and paltry reward, but he soon learns the magnitude of this doubling. Rani's request of one grain of rice doubles into millions of grains of rice and all ends well.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Snap Technology Inc
teams.loan_because: We want too share with the world the fruits of our labor.
teams.description: We are a technology service firms providing solutions to business needs for small and midsized companies.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Northern Ireland
teams.loan_because: We're lucky enough that we can.
teams.description:
Northern Ireland is a small country in the United Kingdom, bordering on The Republic of Ireland.

It's had more than its share of political trouble in the past, but we're getting past that now. There's a brighter future ahead.

The photo is of the Giant's Causeway, our most famous landmark, and was taken by ifyr (http://www.flickr.com/photos/ifyr/1105459227/).

teams.name: Land's End
teams.loan_because: We like to loan because: We know our combined efforts of our industry will help make this world a much better place to live!

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Kiva Uruguay
teams.loan_because: Para colaborar en que alguien pueda cumplir sus sueños y darles una oportunidad.
teams.description: Somos un grupo de uruguayos que desea colaborar con quienes más lo necesitan.

teams.name: Binghamton University
teams.loan_because: We know that everyone can make a difference in this world. We strive to ascend cultural and national differences and just help out... person to person.
teams.description: Enthusiastic and open minded individuals who are passionate about shaping economic growth in all corners of the globe.

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.
